snippet.title: House destroyed by fire in Port Arthur
snippet.content: Fire has ripped through a house in Tasmania's Port Arthur, completely gutting the property. The fire broke out just after 6pm on Friday at a home on Nubeena Road. The residents, who were not home at the time, returned in time to rescue their dog and save their vehicles by moving them away from the scene. The damage was estimated at $250,000. (C) AAP 2017
